attributes.action: force nrp to pay for there children !!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: & stop switching from job to job to avoid paying , They should be hauled to jail for not paying & avoiding paying when they are working . Payments should not decrease just because a 2nd , 3rd child is born . The percentage should stay the same for all. NRP get away with not paying for there children & it isnt right, there are too many loopholes allowing NRP's to avoid paying & avoid paying arrears !! They should not be allowed access if they dont pay either . Its about time they took responsibility for there children !!!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
